oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jane Kittrell Ogles oral history
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ogles, Jane Kittrell
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An oral history excerpt with Jane Kittrell Ogles, a student at Middle Tennessee State Teachers College during World War II. She is pictured on the far right of the photograph. Ogles shares her memories of the Eleventh College Training Detachment on campus during the 1940s
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Campus life
Women college students; Military cadets; United States. Army Air Forces. College Training Detachment, 11th; Middle Tennessee State Teachers College; Middle Tennessee State College
